original: Hi.

original: I woke up 10 minutes before my alarm went off this morning, which I always sort of like but sort of hate because I'd like to sleep that extra 10 minutes.

original: I don't know if what I'm doing is the right thing or the wrong thing and whether I'm helping him or hurting him.

original: It's like anything I do.

original: We watch it like Tuesday's less than a week.

original: It's only 20 minutes episodes.

traduit: Il y a eu un épisode hier soir d'un gars qui est un très vieil ami de Lewis vient en ville et en gros prend Louis et puis lui dit qu'il va se suicider jusqu'à ce qu'on voit que c'était à propos de suicide comme sur le flou James était comme je suis donc on ne l'a pas regardé une nuit.

original: Then the next night.

original: It was like do you want to skip it and he was like, what about you I'm fine and I was like, but let's watch it.

original: It wasn't very it just wasn't great.

original: I don't know.

original: It just didn't go anywhere and it didn't feel inauthentic to me.

original: I just felt like the show's writers.

original: Didn't know what they were trying to say.

original: I don't know.

original: I mean, it's like I don't really know because I can't talk to him about it.

original: I feel like James is just afraid that he's going to come back one day and I will have killed myself, but you know, I can see why one would not trust me to give in that and I can't promise him that I won't I'm trying but I
traduit: J'ai l'impression que James a juste peur qu'il revienne un jour et que je me sois suicidé, mais tu sais, je vois pourquoi on ne me ferait pas confiance et je ne peux pas lui promettre que je ne vais pas essayer, mais j'ai

original: We went out for a drink after church.
traduit: On est allés boire un verre après l'église.

original: I guess two weeks ago.

original: Now are we going to have with the regulars from church and at the very end of the evening, everyone was like like an hour at the very end of the conversation.

original: I think his ordained in the church also, but I'm considering him a psychologist somehow by calling like getting calls from him like emergency calls from his patient came up.

original: I'm like what he said was like well if they're calling me they don't want to die, but they're still suicidal and everyone was like, huh?

original: I'm not quite sure why I thought of that this was the same to evening wear another of the people.

original: I was hanging out with worked at Frederick.

original: So it was kind of a weird evening in that.

original: I don't know fortunately nobody was that interested in listening to me.

original: Like I was part of the conversation, but nobody was relying on you to lead it.
traduit: Comme si je faisais partie de la conversation, mais personne ne comptait sur toi pour la diriger.

original: It was easier than it might have been I didn't have to take a stand or anyting.
traduit: C'était plus facile que ça n'aurait pu être que je n'avais pas à prendre position.

original: Yeah, it could have been much more comfortable than it was.
traduit: Oui, ça aurait pu être beaucoup plus confortable qu'il ne l'était.

original: I think I'm doing better but it doesn't seem fair to you to make promises like that.
traduit: Je pense que je vais mieux, mais il ne vous semble pas juste de faire des promesses comme ça.

original: I'm wondering if one reason it's difficult to talk about it is because it feels like something that I get maybe a little bit more or an easier to talk to you about it then James and that is not uncomfortable.

original: I can't I don't like remember not being able to talk to James about something like that was important in my life before I just never
traduit: Je n'aime pas me souvenir de ne pas avoir pu parler à James de quelque chose comme ça était important dans ma vie avant de ne jamais

original: Even like Falling In Love With Another Man was something I could talk to James about.

traduit: C'est comme si j'avais l'habitude de penser que la plupart des choses sont de ma faute.

original: So it's like I don't even notice it anymore.

original: It's just like a baseline assumption until like I start thinking that things would just be better if I were part of the equation, but that's exactly the problem right now.

original: Like the fact that I think that is what what is problematic.

original: I don't know if that makes sense.

original: So driving into one of the events.
traduit: Je me rends à l'un des événements.

original: I think it was like the brunch on Sunday because it was the one that got heated.
traduit: Je pense que c'était comme le brunch de dimanche parce que c'était celui qui s'est chauffé.

original: I remember just sitting there very clearly and thinking this is because of something I did.
traduit: Je me souviens être assis là très clairement et penser que c'est à cause de quelque chose que j'ai fait.

original: This is my fault and like I think I remember that most I think I remember that most because it was so clear that it was really not my fault at all.
traduit: C'est ma faute et comme je pense que je me souviens que je me souviens le plus de cela parce qu'il était tellement clair que ce n'était pas du tout ma faute.

original: Like it was not anything I did or anything I could have done to prevent it.

original: So yeah fairly self-centered.
traduit: Donc oui plutôt égocentrique.

original: I feel like James is having a rough time and maybe it's because of me maybe it's not but I feel like it must not it must be because of me and it is incumbent on me to fix unlike.
traduit: J'ai l'impression que James passe un moment difficile et que c'est peut-être à cause de moi que ce n'est peut-être pas le cas, mais j'ai l'impression que ça ne doit pas être à cause de moi et qu'il m'appartient de réparer à la différence.

original: I know those things aren't true, but I just can't handle it.

original: I can think that it's embarrassing to ask what I think because it's hard to imagine that I'm not thinking critically of you or maybe you're not being in more control or not being more rational or for even being involved.
traduit: Je peux penser qu'il est embarrassant de demander ce que je pense parce qu'il est difficile d'imaginer que je ne pense pas critiquement à vous ou peut-être que vous n'êtes pas dans le contrôle ou n'êtes pas plus rationnel ou même d'être impliqué.

original: Yeah, I guess I'm in sort of a double bind where I worried that if I talk about constantly thinking that everything is my fault.
traduit: Ouais, je suppose que je suis dans une sorte de double liaison où j'ai peur que si je parle constamment de penser que tout est de ma faute.

original: You will think that it's very selfish and irrational of her and if I don't talk about it, you will say don't you realize that everything is your fault?

original: so sort of fact

original: Unclear and people keep telling me it's not my fault.

original: I don't know how those two are in conflict with each other.

original: James keeps telling me that it's not my fault that he's really pissed at me for for it all the same time so I don't

original: I don't know.
